33  package edu.internet2.middleware.grouper.cache;
34  import java.io.File;
35  import java.net.URL;
36  
37  import net.sf.ehcache.Cache;
38  import net.sf.ehcache.CacheManager;
39  import net.sf.ehcache.Statistics;
40  
41  import org.apache.commons.lang.StringUtils;
42  import org.apache.commons.logging.Log;
43  
44  import edu.internet2.middleware.grouper.util.GrouperUtil;
45  
46  
47  
48  /**
49   * Base class for common cache operations.
50   * @author  blair christensen.
51   * @version $Id: EhcacheController.java,v 1.13 2009-08-11 20:34:18 mchyzer Exp $
52   * @since   1.2.1
53   */
54  public class EhcacheController implements CacheController {
55  
56    /**
57     * singleton cache controller
58     */
59    private static EhcacheController ehcacheController = null;
60  
61    /**
62     * utility cache controller if you dont want to create your own...
63     * @return ehcache controller
64     */
65    public static EhcacheController ehcacheController() {
66      if (ehcacheController == null) {
67        ehcacheController = new EhcacheController();
68      }
69      return ehcacheController;
70    }
71  
72    /**
73     * manager
74     */
75    private CacheManager mgr;
76  
77    /**
78     * @see java.lang.Object#finalize()
79     */
80    @Override
81    protected void finalize() throws Throwable {
82      super.finalize();
83      this.stop();
84    }
85  
86    /**
87     * @see edu.internet2.middleware.grouper.privs.AccessResolver#stop()
88     */
89    public void stop() {
90      if (this.mgr != null) {
91        synchronized(CacheManager.class) {
92          this.mgr.shutdown();
93        }
94      }
95    }
96  
97   
98    /**
99     * not public since we only want one of these...
100    * Initialize caching.
101    * @since   2.1.0
102    */
103   private EhcacheController() {
104   }
105 
106 
107 
108   /**
109    * Flush all caches.
110    * @since   1.2.1
111    */
112   public void flushCache() {
113     if (this.mgr != null) {
114       this.mgr.clearAll(); // TODO 20070823 how much of a performance hit is calling this method?
115     }
116   }
117 
118   /**
119    * Retrieve a grouper cache (like a generic Map)
120    * @param name should be unique, prefix with fully qualified classname
121    * @return  Cache <i>name</i>.
122    * @throws  IllegalStateException if cache not found.
123    * @since   1.2.1
124    */
125   public GrouperCache getGrouperCache(String name) 
126     throws  IllegalStateException { 
127     //dont use defaults
128     return getGrouperCache(name, false, -1, false, -1, -1, false);
129   }
130   
131   /**
132    * Retrieve a GrouperCache which is a generic Map cache.  Note the defaults are only used
133    * in the first invocation of the cache retrieval.
134    * @param name should be unique, prefix with fully qualified classname
135    * @param useDefaultIfNotInConfigFile use the defaults if not in the config file
136    * @param defaultMaxElementsInMemory if not in config file, this is max elements in memory
137    * @param defaultEternal if not in config file,  true to never expire stuff
138    * @param defaultTimeToIdleSeconds  if not in config file, time where if not accessed, will expire
139    * @param defaultTimeToLiveSeconds  if not in config file, time where even if accessed, will expire
140    * @param defaultOverflowToDisk  if not in config file, if it should go to disk in overflow
141    * @return  Cache <i>name</i>.
142    * @throws  IllegalStateException if cache not found.
143    * @since   1.2.1
144    */
145   public GrouperCache getGrouperCache(String name, boolean useDefaultIfNotInConfigFile,
146       int defaultMaxElementsInMemory, 
147       boolean defaultEternal, int defaultTimeToIdleSeconds, 
148       int defaultTimeToLiveSeconds, boolean defaultOverflowToDisk) 
149     throws  IllegalStateException { 
150     return new GrouperCache(this.getCache(name, useDefaultIfNotInConfigFile, 
151         defaultMaxElementsInMemory, defaultEternal, defaultTimeToIdleSeconds, 
152         defaultTimeToLiveSeconds, defaultOverflowToDisk));
153   }
154   
155   /**
156    * Note, this might be better to be used from GrouperCache
157    * @param name should be unique, prefix with fully qualified classname
158    * @return  Cache <i>name</i>.
159    * @throws  IllegalStateException if cache not found.
160    * @since   1.2.1
161    */
162   public Cache getCache(String name) 
163     throws  IllegalStateException { 
164     //dont use defaults
165     return getCache(name, false, -1, false, -1, -1, false);
166   }
167   
168   /**
169    * Note, this might be better to be used from GrouperCache
170    * @param name should be unique, prefix with fully qualified classname
171    * @param useDefaultIfNotInConfigFile use the defaults if not in the config file
172    * @param defaultMaxElementsInMemory if not in config file, this is max elements in memory
173    * @param defaultEternal if not in config file,  true to never expire stuff
174    * @param defaultTimeToIdleSeconds  if not in config file, time where if not accessed, will expire
175    * @param defaultTimeToLiveSeconds  if not in config file, time where even if accessed, will expire
176    * @param defaultOverflowToDisk  if not in config file, if it should go to disk in overflow
177    * @return  Cache <i>name</i>.
178    * @throws  IllegalStateException if cache not found.
179    * @since   1.2.1
180    */
181   public Cache getCache(String name, boolean useDefaultIfNotInConfigFile,
182       int defaultMaxElementsInMemory, 
183       boolean defaultEternal, int defaultTimeToIdleSeconds, 
184       int defaultTimeToLiveSeconds, boolean defaultOverflowToDisk) 
185     throws  IllegalStateException { 
186     this.initialize();
187     if (this.mgr.cacheExists(name) ) {
188       return this.mgr.getCache(name);
189     }
190     if (useDefaultIfNotInConfigFile) {
191       if (LOG != null) {
192         LOG.info("cache not configured explicitly: " + name + ", to override default values, " +
193         		"configure in the resource /ehcache.xml.  Default values are:" +
194         		"maxElementsInMemory: " + defaultMaxElementsInMemory + ", eternal: " + defaultEternal
195         		+ ", timeToIdleSeconds: " + defaultTimeToIdleSeconds + ", timeToLiveSeconds: " 
196         		+ defaultTimeToLiveSeconds + ", overFlowToDisk: " + defaultOverflowToDisk);
197       }
198       Cache cache = new Cache(name, defaultMaxElementsInMemory, defaultOverflowToDisk, 
199           defaultEternal, defaultTimeToLiveSeconds, defaultTimeToIdleSeconds);
200       //TODO CH 20081118, see if cache by name there already...
201       this.mgr.addCache(cache);
202       return cache;
203     }
204     
205     throw new IllegalStateException("cache not found: " + name + " make sure the cache" +
206         " config is correct, the resource: /ehcache.xml");
207   }
208 
209   /** logger */
210   private static final Log LOG = GrouperUtil.getLog(EhcacheController.class);
211 
212   /**
213    * @param cache 
214    * @return  ehcache statistics for <i>cache</i>.
215    * @since   1.2.1
216    */
217   public CacheStats getStats(String cache) {
218     //not sure if we need to initialize, since no stats will be found...
219     this.initialize();
220     Cache c = this.getCache(cache);
221     c.setStatisticsAccuracy(Statistics.STATISTICS_ACCURACY_GUARANTEED);
222     return new EhcacheStats( c.getStatistics() );
223   }
224 
225   /** 
226    * Initialize privilege cache.
227    * @since   1.2.1
228    */
229   public void initialize() {
230     if (this.mgr == null) {
231       synchronized(EhcacheController.class) {
232         if (this.mgr == null) {
233           URL url = this.getClass().getResource("/ehcache.xml");
234           if (url == null) {
235             throw new RuntimeException("Cant find resource /ehcache.xml, " +
236                 "make sure it is on the classpath");
237           }
238           
239           //trying to avoid warning of using the same dir
240           String tmpDir = GrouperUtil.tmpDir();
241           try {
242             String newTmpdir = StringUtils.trimToEmpty(tmpDir);
243             if (!newTmpdir.endsWith("\\") && !newTmpdir.endsWith("/")) {
244               newTmpdir += File.separator;
245             }
246             newTmpdir += "grouper_ehcache_auto_" + GrouperUtil.uniqueId();
247             System.setProperty(GrouperUtil.JAVA_IO_TMPDIR, newTmpdir);
248             
249             synchronized(CacheManager.class) {
250               //now it should be using a unique directory
251               this.mgr = new CacheManager(url);
252             }
253           } finally {
254             
255             //put tmpdir back
256             if (tmpDir == null) {
257               System.clearProperty(GrouperUtil.JAVA_IO_TMPDIR);
258             } else {
259               System.setProperty(GrouperUtil.JAVA_IO_TMPDIR, tmpDir);
260             }
261           }
262         }
263       }
264     }
265   }
266   
267 }
